author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Pondicherry Industrial Promotion Development and Investment Corporation Ltd has invited applications from potential entrepreneurs for allotment of developed/undeveloped industrial plots/lands on premium lease basis at the Industrial Growth Centre, Polagam in Karaikal.

Those interested can apply in the prescribed form available on the Corporation website (pipdic.com)

Preference will be given for sectors that involve use of the Karaikal port and are export-oriented, non-polluting and units set up by women/NRI/technocrats, local residents, economically weaker sections and are employment-intensive, according to a Government press note.
title: Applications invited from entrepreneurs
